item.title: eLogii awarded a spot on the G-Cloud12 Framework in the UK
item.description: eLogii is now part of the G-Cloud 12 Framework which helps Public Sector Organizations find, evaluate, and buy cloud services from a selection of suppliers based in the United Kingdom.

item.title: 9 Reasons Why It’s Impossible to Map Multiple Stops Without Software
item.description: In this new post, we’ll take a look at manual planning.
